title: Canonical embeddings into the ordered field of the real numbers

blocks.name: zrhre
blocks.content: The ` ZRHom ` homomorphism for the real number structure is the identity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhre() {
  |- wceq(cfv(czrh, crefld), cres(cid, cz))
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(czrh, crefld), cres(cid, cz), cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1)), cmpt(hs0, cz, cv(hs0)))
  mp2b(wceq(cfv(czrh, crefld), cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1))), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, crg))
  simpri(wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  resubdrg()
  drngring(crefld)
  zrhval2(hs0, crefld, cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1)
  eqid(cfv(czrh, crefld))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, crefld))
  re1r()
  mpteq2ia(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1), cv(hs0))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat1), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, crefld), nat1), co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  remulg(cv(hs0), nat1)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  zre(cv(hs0))
  ax-1rid(cv(hs0))
  mptresid(hs0, cz)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmg, crefld))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhre() {
  ‚ä¢ (ZRHom ` RRfld)=(= |` ‚Ñ§)
} = {
  3eqtri((ZRHom ` RRfld), (= |` ‚Ñ§), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` RRfld)]1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶ hs0))
  mp2b((ZRHom ` RRfld)=(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` RRfld)]1)), RRfld ‚àà DivRing, RRfld ‚àà Ring)
  simpri(RRfld ‚àà DivRing, ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  resubdrg()
  drngring(crefld)
  zrhval2(hs0, crefld, (ZRHom ` RRfld), (.g ` RRfld), nat1)
  eqid((ZRHom ` RRfld))
  eqid((.g ` RRfld))
  re1r()
  mpteq2ia(hs0, cz, (hs0[(.g ` RRfld)]1), hs0)
  eqtrd((hs0[(.g ` RRfld)]1), hs0, (hs0[√ó]1), hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  mpan2(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (hs0[(.g ` RRfld)]1)=(hs0[√ó]1), 1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  1re()
  remulg(hs0, nat1)
  syl(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (hs0[√ó]1)= hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  zre(hs0)
  ax-1rid(hs0)
  mptresid(hs0, cz)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c((.g ` RRfld))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
}

blocks.name: qqhre
blocks.content: The ` QQHom ` homomorphism for the real number structure is the identity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm qqhre() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cres(cid, cq))
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cres(cid, cq), cmpt(hs0, cq, cfv(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cv(hs0))), cmpt(hs0, cq, cv(hs0)))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cmpt(hs0, cq, cfv(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cv(hs0)))))
  feqmptd(hs0, cfv(cqqh, crefld), cq, cr, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wf(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cq, cr))
  mp2an(wf(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cq, cr), wcel(crefld, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, crefld), nat0))
  qqhf(crefld, cr, cfv(cdvr, crefld), cfv(czrh, crefld))
  mpteq2ia(hs0, cq, cfv(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cfv(cdvr, crefld), cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cdiv, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  mpanl12(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(cqqh, crefld), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cfv(cdvr, crefld), cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))))), wcel(crefld, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, crefld), nat0))
  mp2b(wceq(cfv(cchr, crefld), nat0), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, crg))
  mpbiri(wcel(crefld, crg), wceq(cfv(cchr, crefld), nat0), wf1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr))
  zrhchr(crefld, cfv(czrh, crefld), cr, nat0)
  qqhvval(crefld, cv(hs0), cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdvr, crefld), cr)
  eqid(cfv(cdvr, crefld))
  syl3anc(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cfv(cdvr, crefld), cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cdiv, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cr), wcel(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), cr), wne(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0))
  ffvelrnd(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cr, cz, wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  ffvelrnd(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cr, cz, wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wf(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr))
  neqned(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  pm2.65da(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0), wa(wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0)))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0), wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz))
  3bitr3ri(wceq(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0), wa(wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0)), wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, crefld)), csn(nat0))), wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), csn(nat0)))
  eleq2i(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, crefld)), csn(nat0)), csn(nat0))
  mpbi(wceq(cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, crefld)), csn(nat0)), csn(nat0)), wf1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr))
  mp2b(wb(wf1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr), wceq(cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, crefld)), csn(nat0)), csn(nat0))), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, crg))
  simpri(wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  resubdrg()
  drngring(crefld)
  zrhf1ker(crefld, cfv(czrh, crefld), cr, nat0)
  rebase()
  eqid(cfv(czrh, crefld))
  re0g()
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, crefld)), csn(nat0))), wa(wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0))), wf(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr), wfn(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz))
  ax-mp(wf(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr), wf1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr))
  mpbir(wf1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr), wf1(cres(cid, cz), cz, cr))
  mp2an(wf1(cres(cid, cz), cz, cr), wf1(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz), wss(cz, cr))
  ax-mp(wf1(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz), wf1o(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz))
  f1oi(cz)
  f1of1(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz)
  zssre()
  f1ss(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz, cr)
  ax-mp(wb(wf1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr), wf1(cres(cid, cz), cz, cr)), wceq(cfv(czrh, crefld), cres(cid, cz)))
  f1eq1(cfv(czrh, crefld), cres(cid, cz), cz, cr)
  f1f(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr)
  ffn(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cr)
  fniniseg(cfv(czrh, crefld), cz, cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0)
  elsn(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0)
  fvex(cdenom, cv(hs0))
  neneqd(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), nat0), wne(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  nnne0d(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  redvr(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cdiv, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), co(cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  oveq12d(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cdiv, cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cz))
  qnumcl(cv(hs0))
  syl5eq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, cz), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cz))
  fveq1i(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cz))
  fvresi(cfv(cnumer, cv(hs0)), cz)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wceq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz))
  nnzd(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cq))
  qdencl(cv(hs0))
  syl5eq(cfv(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cid, cz), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz))
  fveq1i(cfv(czrh, crefld), cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cz))
  zrhre()
  fvresi(cfv(cdenom, cv(hs0)), cz)
  qeqnumdivden(cv(hs0))
  mptresid(hs0, cq)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cqqh, crefld))
  diff.hs0.c(cq)
}

blocks.name: rrhre
blocks.content: The ` RRHom ` homomorphism for the real numbers structure is the identity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrhre() {
  |- wceq(cfv(crrh, crefld), cres(cid, cr))
} = {
  mptru(wceq(cfv(crrh, crefld), cres(cid, cr)))
  hauseqcn(cfv(crrh, crefld), cres(cid, cr), cr, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cq, wtru)
  mp1i(wtru, wcel(cfv(crrh, crefld), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccn, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(crefld, crrext))
  rerrext()
  rrhcne(crefld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cres(cid, cr), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccn, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cres(cfv(crrh, crefld), cq), cres(cres(cid, cr), cq)))
  3eqtr4i(cres(cfv(crrh, crefld), cq), cres(cres(cid, cr), cq), cres(cfv(co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccnext, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), cres(cid, cq)), cq), cres(cid, cq))
  mptru(wceq(cres(cfv(co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccnext, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), cres(cid, cq)), cq), cres(cid, cq)))
  cnextfres1(hs0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cres(cid, cq), cq, cr, cr, wtru)
